设置参数`hideOnSinglePage=True`，仅有1页时自动隐藏分页组.en-us: Set the parameter `hideOnSinglePage=True` to automatically hide the pagination component when there is only 1 page.

设置快速跳页、每页记录数选择器、前后缀信息等功能。.en-us: Set quick jump page, page number selection, prefix information, etc. function.

设置参数`showLessItems=True`时会展示较少的跳页按钮。.en-us: Set the parameter `showLessItems=True` to show less jump page buttons.

设置参数`simple=True`开启极简模式。.en-us: Set the parameter `simple=True` to enable the simplified mode.

设置参数`size='small'`开启迷你模式。.en-us: Set the parameter `size='small'` to enable the mini mode.

设置参数`align`控制分页控件对齐方式。.en-us: Set the parameter `align` to control the alignment of the pagination control.

可用于监听分页相关事件。.en-us: Used to listen to pagination related events.
